mapper.select: select id, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, student_pay as studentPay, student_enroll as studentEnroll, student_photo as studentPhoto, gender, class_name as className, student_status as studentStatus, is_delete as isDelete, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_student_info where is_delete = 0 order by id desc limit #{dataNum}, #{limit};

select id, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, student_pay as studentPay, student_enroll as studentEnroll, student_photo as studentPhoto, gender, class_name as className, student_status as studentStatus, is_delete as isDelete, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_student_info where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_student_info (student_id, student_name, student_pay, student_enroll, student_photo, gender, class_name, student_status, is_delete, create_time, update_time) values (#{studentId}, #{studentName}, #{studentPay}, #{studentEnroll}, #{studentPhoto}, #{gender}, #{className}, #{studentStatus}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
